content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":415310,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4cf03c8c-c320-4372-83a3-0ad9fac600e2/first day.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4cf03c8c-c320-4372-83a3-0ad9fac600e2/first day.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"first day.PNG\",\"name\":\"first day.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"4cf03c8c-c320-4372-83a3-0ad9fac600e2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":881,\"height\":285},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Earlier you've already signed your contract and all necessary paperwork in PwC (our partners)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here is a couple of things you should do on your first day:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.\\tPick up your laptop. PC comes with standard set of mouse, headphones and docking. Monitor and keyboard provided under additional request. Please let us know if you need any of those. How to pick it up: please call or e-mail Linas Grinevicius (Linas_Grinevicius@epam.com) - our administrative director (tel. +370 (656) 57 171). Linas will inform you where and when to pick up your laptop.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.\\tLogin in into corporate account. You will be given instructions together with laptop.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.\\tHave a meeting with your manager and HR. Invite will be sent to you on your first day.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.\\tStart with adaptation process â€“ onboarding.epam.com. You will be given all instruction via corporate email on your first day. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":5815,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/eff63376-a952-4e4e-b885-fa9e308e93a8/duo.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/eff63376-a952-4e4e-b885-fa9e308e93a8/duo.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"duo.PNG\",\"name\":\"duo.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"eff63376-a952-4e4e-b885-fa9e308e93a8\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":877,\"height\":60},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
